effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An attack that hits a foe using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.
flavor_text.platinum: An attack that hits a foe using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An attack that hits a foe using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.
